channel.title: CVE Feed for TIBCO Software Inc. -- TIBCO Silver Fabric
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TIBCO Software Inc. -- TIBCO Silver Fabric

item.title: CVE-2019-17339|2024-08-05T01:40:14.516Z -- tibco%20software%20inc. -- tibco%20silver%20fabric
item.description: The VirtualRouter component of TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO Silver Fabric contains a vulnerability that theoretically allows an attacker to inject scripts via URLs. The attacker could theoretically social engineer an authenticated user into submitting the URL, thus executing the script on the affected system with the privileges of the user. Affected releases are TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO Silver Fabric: versions 6.0.0 and below.
